articles.author: Jamie Gumbrecht and Naomi Thomas, CNN
articles.title: CDC says 14-day Covid-19 quarantine can be shortened to 7 to 10 days
articles.description: Covid-19 quarantine periods can be as short as seven to 10 days for some people, the CDC advised Wednesday, but a 14-day quarantine after coronavirus exposure remains the safest option.

articles.title: FDA chief meets with Meadows again as Trump remains frustrated with pace of vaccine approval
articles.description: Embattled Food and Drug Administration Commissioner Stephen Hahn met with White House chief of staff Mark Meadows for second day in a row on Wednesday as President Donald Trump remains frustrated no Covid-19 vaccine has been granted US emergency approval yet.
